content: अपोहः {@--1@} Removing, driving away, healing &c. {@--2@} Removal of doubt by the exercise of the reasoning faculty. {@--3@} Reasoning, arguing; reasoning faculty. {@--4@} Negative reasoning (<ab>opp.</ab> ऊह) (अपरतर्कनिरासाय कृतो विपरीतस्तर्कः), one of the {%dhīgunas%} <ab>q. v.</ab>; स्वयमूहापोहासमर्थः <ls>Mbh.</ls>; ऊहापोहमिमं सरोजनयना यावद्विधत्तेतरां <ls>Bv. 2. 74</ls>; hence ऊहापोह = complete discussion of a question. {@--5@} Excluding all things not coming under the category in point; तद्वानपोहो वा शब्दार्थः (where Maheśvara paraphrases अपोह by अतद्व्यावृत्ति {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} तद्भिन्नत्यागः)
